content.text: 2 tablespoons olive oil, divided
content.eamr: ( ing-0 "2 tablespoons olive oil, divided" )

content.text: 2 (6 ounce) skinless, boneless chicken breast halves
content.eamr: ( ing-1 "2 (6 ounce) skinless, boneless chicken breast halves" )

content.text: 1 1/2 tablespoons Cajun seasoning
content.eamr: ( ing-2 "1 1/2 tablespoons Cajun seasoning" )

content.text: 2 cloves garlic, crushed
content.eamr: ( ing-3 "2 cloves garlic, crushed" )

content.text: 1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar
content.eamr: ( ing-4 "1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar" )

content.text: 1 teaspoon Dijon mustard
content.eamr: ( ing-5 "1 teaspoon Dijon mustard" )

content.text: salt and black pepper to taste
content.eamr: ( ing-6 "salt and black pepper to taste" )

content.text: 2 cups mixed salad greens
content.eamr: ( ing-7 "2 cups mixed salad greens" )

content.text: 1 cup arugula
content.eamr: ( ing-8 "1 cup arugula" )

content.text: 1 avocado - peeled, pitted, and diced
content.eamr: ( ing-9 "1 avocado - peeled, pitted, and diced" )

content.text: 12 oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes, drained and sliced
content.eamr: ( ing-10 "12 oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes, drained and sliced" )

content.text: 1/2 cup sliced black olives
content.eamr: ( ing-11 "1/2 cup sliced black olives" )

content.text: 0) Warm 1 tablespoon olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Warm"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "1 tablespoon olive oil"@8:30 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a large skillet"@34:49 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "medium heat"@55:66 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Season both sides of chicken with Cajun seasoning, and place in hot oil.
2) Stir in crushed garlic.
3) Cook chicken 5 minutes on each side, or until juices run clear.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Cook"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( "chicken"@8:15 / FOOD )
		:duration ( dur-3-0 "5 minutes"@16:25 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-3-0 "until juices run clear"@43:65 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:mnr ( "on each side"@26:38 / OTHER )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Remove chicken from skillet, drain on paper towels, cool slightly, and dice; discard oil and garlic.
5) In a small bowl, mix remaining olive oil, balsamic vinegar, mustard, salt, and pepper.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "mix"@20:23 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "remaining olive oil"@24:43 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "balsamic vinegar"@45:61 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "mustard"@63:70 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "salt, and pepper"@72:88 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-5-0 "a small bowl"@6:18 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 6) In a large bowl, gently toss the dressing with the mixed salad greens, arugula, avocado, sun-dried tomatoes, and olives.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "toss"@27:31 / AC
		:ppt ( "the dressing"@32:44 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "the mixed salad greens"@50:72 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "arugula"@74:81 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-9 "avocado"@83:90 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-10 "sun-dried tomatoes"@92:110 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-11 "olives"@116:122 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-6-0 "a large bowl"@6:18 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 7) Top with diced chicken to serve.
content.eamr:
( inst-7 / R
	:inform ( ac-7-0 "Top"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( "diced chicken"@12:25 / FOOD )
		:gol ( NULL / FOOD )
		:prp ( purp-7-0 "to serve"@26:34 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
	)
)
